title: New: Blaue Blume – Helen
content:
After what feels like forever, Danish quartet Blaue Blume release the follow up to their stunning debut track, On New Years Eve. Helen, self-described by the band as narrating the story of ‘the denied lover desperately [seeking] answers in his misery’, and as to be expected, the vocals are as entrancing as ever. Part Alt-J, part Wild Beasts, it’s further proof that the Copenhagen band are one of the most exciting prospects around at this present moment. Check out Helen below, and be sure to catch them at one of their debut UK shows (dates after the jump).

don’t you remember me / met when we were 17 / wrote each others names in a heart on a tree

20 August, Birthdays, London

21 August, Dulcimer Bar, Manchester
